info.name: class1-module1-lab03-delete
info.description: This solution was created using template 1.10

exec: //Define the number of virtual servers in this solution
//THis below varaibles are using for defining the tenant ID in AS3.  This should be the solution number. Example: solution1 or solution2.
//This is the primary section defining the settings for the application the solutions is going to deploy

//This variable is used for switching between standard and modern for logon pages, webtops, and other objects that support those changes.

item.name: Delete Virtuals Server Address 1 from BIG-IP Server

exec: pm.test("Virtual Server "+VS_NAME+" deleted from server", function () {
pm.test("Virtual Server "+VS_NAME+" does not exist", function () {
